pages.text: The $(item)Horrylis$() could hardly survive on its own, were it not sustained by magic.$(br)Its smell reminds you of something long forgotten, something that should have stayed forgotten.$(br2)The nights spent close to this flower were nights of utter $(marked)hopelessness$().
This flower is created by swallowing $(l:vitalis/entry_seed)Dormant Seeds$() at night, while it's raining.$(br)The person swallowing the seed must be under the feeling of $(marked)dread$().
